Put an apple in your mouth, then we’ll get started roasting

The only thing more obnoxious than your ego is that mess on top of your head. You pander to a young audience who is too naive to understand just how unoriginal and mediocre you really are. Thankfully I feel safe knowing that your reign in the entertainment industry will be short lived, and that you will ultimately fade away like the rest of the conformists to pop culture. Learn from your mistakes, unlike your brother, and move on.

Edit: Thanks for the gold kind strangers. By the way, please don't dab on me. I am not a hater. He asked for this; and yes, maybe I was a little harsh, but this is r/roastme, not the youtube comment section.

Didn't think I would ever use this knowledge on this sub but hey here goes. 

There's many reasons or claims as to why OP is cooked with an apple in his mouth. Some claim for gasses to pass others for keeping the head looking right. The most accepted reason is from ages ago when apples were the feed for OP's ancestors and were given to bulk them up for slaughter, thus putting one in the mouth is a salute to how the pigs were raised.

TL;DR - just an old practice that really has no point other than aesthetics.

So irrelevant to an older audience he had to post it more than once. That probably hurts him more than any superficial roast we could come up with. And it tells a story of a sad person clawing for attention his parents never gave him. Trying to fill a void present ever since early childhood. And now that he's realizing that the 9 y olds that watch him on Youtube can't do that he's reaching out on reddit, an attempt to garner a more mature audience in hope that he finally can be happy, believing in "fake it til you make it". But even if he manages to gain an older fanbase he will never fill the hole in his heart that his upbringing left him with. And that. That's just sad.

That's why you wear loose clothing, because you know as time goes on and you become fatter and more overweight you'll "grow into it."  You'll save money that way over the years, which is great because that dead end job in the middle of nowhere town that you've never been able to get out of won't last forever.  I like that you're not a poser, wearing tight clothing thinking you're "big boned" or "muscular fat."   No, you know exactly what you are.  You are a useless, meaningless existence living out in the middle of nowhere and when you die nothing will happen.  Not a single thing will change in the world.  You could change this, but you won't.  So you just wait for your biological clock to be up and go back into the nothingness that created you, without anyone in the world batting an eye.
